name: Peeenguin!
description:
(On web) Please zoom out so the game can be correctly displayed.

Avoid the obstacles to save your pengui-parents from the aliens!  Pick up medkits and shields to heal yourself, and fuel canisters to keep going!

Fit the ring in the yellow area for a higher health, or things won't be that easy!

WASD - Move

Slide (Mobile) - Move
